name: Little Feet, Cold Nights
description: Strange lights in the forest, claw marks on the doors of regular citizens, and worst of all; their beloved pets are being attacked and killed. The town of West Easthaven is under attack by unknown forces for nefarious reasons. Can our adventurers put together the clues to make sense of these strange events or will the citizens continue to be terrorized by these odd disturbances? Part One of the *To Survive the Night* series.
adventureSeed: My, What Big Feet You Have

items.name: Scroll of Protection from Evil and Good

name: A New Place to Call Home
description: Undead pour from an abandon keep in The Frozen North, threatening the already tenuous balance of life in the Ten-Towns, as an unlikely benefactor seeks heroes in hopes of turning this keep into a future stronghold. Secrets and dangers await the heroes as they venture out into the unforgiving cold. Part Two of the *To Survive the Night* series.

name: Personal Fouls and Penalties
description: Morale in the small village of Goodenow has fallen to an all-time low with the suspicious death of the star goat-ball player on the eve of a big match. When a shadowy enemy begins to target a local team of bonesetters, the mystery deepens. Is it game over in Goodenow? Part Three of the *To Survive the Night* series.

name: As Above, So Below
description: A lottery held under suspicous circumstances. A Paladin trying to do the right thing. Can the adventurers find the truth in time? Part Four of the *To Survive the Night* series.

items.name: Spell Scroll of Detect Evil and Good

name: Shard of Hope
description: When arcane experimentation creates artifacts that ensnare the mind and beguile the senses, only the bravest adventurers can resist the toxic temptation of desecration and darkness, to travel to where this evil lies and defeat it. Lies are brought to bear and secrets are revealed. Part Five of the *To Survive the Night* series.

name: A Wolf’s Whisper
description: Talking beasts have been wandering around Easthaven, whispering about a crimson star. The villagers, taking advantage of this situation, are killing these animals for food. One injured wolf managed to evade the hunters, but they are not willing to let their game escape. Part One of *The Crimson Star* series.
creator: Greasy Snitches

name: The Missing Link
description: Someone’s mysterious disappearance started a chain of kidnappings, the most recent of which is tied to someone dear to an old man. He is desperate to find out where they were taken. Can the adventurers unravel the mystery behind these missing individuals? Part One of The *Frozen Eye* series.
creator: Greasy Snitches

name: The Coldlight Star
description: A day of unusual warmth slices through the everlasting rime, giving the town of Termalaine a ray of hope. But only a fool would think breaking Auril’s hold would be easy. Can you weather what mortal hubris has wrought? Or will Termalaine be undone by…The Coldlight Star.
creator: The Legitimate Business
